Subject: EPP Client Preventing Proton VPN SSO Sign In
Description:
EPP is causing the Proton VPN Client from failing an SSO sign in via Okta.

Sign in works without issue when EPP Client has been removed.
What_We_Know__c:
20/05/2025
Client claims the EPP client is preventing them from accessing the Proton VPN through SSO.
Solution_Comment__c:
After enabling Stealthy DPI Driver, the user was able to log on Proton VPN.
Customer will enable Stealthy DPI Driver for the affected users
Account_Name__c: The Stars Group Interactive Services / Flutter International
